pullrequest.title: New "Spawn Atlas into custom world" to replace "Modify environment" (DRCSim)

content.raw:
The only thing it does not cover are instances where its necessary to delete a <state> or a an Atlas <model> tags from a saved world.

This tutorial should replace the older one, since it is simpler and achieves the goals.
content.html:
The only thing it does not cover are instances where its necessary to delete a <state> or a an Atlas <model> tags from a saved world.
